subject: Sexual Health
title: Navigating Sexual Conflict
description: A short lesson to help you apply Navigating Sexual Conflict.

hook.text: Sexual disagreements are among the hardest conversations couples face, yet avoiding them causes even more damage.

buildup.text: Common conflicts include frequency, preferences, boundaries, and unspoken expectations about sexual roles.

discovery.text: Gottman found that 69% of relationship conflicts are perpetualâ€”they never fully resolve but can be managed.

twist.text: The goal is not to eliminate sexual disagreements but to discuss them with respect, humor, and compassion.

climax.text: Couples who face sexual conflicts together with openness grow closer than those who avoid the conversation.

punchline.text: Not every problem has a solution. Every problem needs a conversation.
